meanings.definition: Tiny indentations on a surface, especially on a vinyl record.
meanings.sent1: The vinyl record had intricate microgrooves that held the music.
meanings.sent2: The stylus followed the microgrooves on the record to play the song.
meanings.sent3: I found a tiny ant exploring the microgrooves on the record.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts flowed like music through the microgrooves of her mind.
meanings.sent5: The sunlight caught the microgrooves, creating a beautiful pattern.

meanings.definition: Small grooves that improve the performance of a stylus on a record player.
meanings.sent1: The new record player had advanced microgrooves for better sound quality.
meanings.sent2: The stylus glided smoothly along the microgrooves, producing clear music.
meanings.sent3: The tiny mouse loved to dance along the microgrooves of the record player.
meanings.sent4: His fingers moved over the piano keys like a stylus on microgrooves.
meanings.sent5: The microgrooves on the record player were like a secret code for perfect sound.
